description:
Urashima Tarou visits an undersea palace.  A priest teaches a magistrate a lesson for wasting his time. A horse falls in love with a princess.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Urashima Tarou / The One Ka Priest / The Body-Throwing Stone
Urashimatarou / Ikka Oshou / Mi Nage Ishi
浦島太郎 / 一荷おしょう / 身なげ石
